response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, the product is worth $1,000,000 to you. After careful consideration, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent value proposition, considering the immense benefits the product can bring to your business. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a mutually beneficial partnership.", "product_price": 950000}
